column5: The Environmental Pollution and Remediation programme at Aberdeen covers all you need to know to assess and analyse pollutants in our environment. You learn to understand legislation and policies relating to pollution control as well as recognised environmental risk assessment methods. Our programme includes a wide variety of courses relevant to pollution and its management. These include environmental pollution, remediation technology, hydrocarbon risk assessment and remediation, environmental analysis and environmental impact assessments (EIA). During these courses you will develop key skills in environmental policy, legislation, risk assessment models and chemical analysis.
